data.eml:eml: Three new species of Percnobracon Kieffer & Jörgensen (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Argentina, reared from cecidomyiid (Diptera) and eurytomid (Hymenoptera) galls

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martinez, Juan José (2006): Three new species of Percnobracon Kieffer & Jörgensen (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Argentina, reared from cecidomyiid (Diptera) and eurytomid (Hymenoptera) galls. Zootaxa 1282: 49-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173438
